reviews.review_msg: Extremely Fun teacher, very knowledgeable and well traveled. She is a practicing Archaeologist and has some great stories. Her tests are fair but expect to study quite a bit. She was a lot of fun to chat with.

She has the laziest teaching method I've ever seen. Just show a couple videos per class, cut-and-paste the final exam questions from the study guide, and tah-dah, you've got a 300 level university course. A pretty uninspiring class overall.

Since when did the teaching become limited to pressing the play button on the VCR? Must have watched at least two movies every lecture.  Class was easy though, and Barbara was nice- but come on.  I must have fallen asleep every week!
